addRemoteChain(uint64,(address,address,u.details: admin can configure a remote chain for first time

params.chainId_: is the identifier of new chain id

calculateAMBData(uint64,uint8[],bytes).details: returns the amb overrides & gas to be used

params.ambIds_: is the identifiers of arbitrary message bridges to be used
params.dstChainId_: is the unique dst chain identifier

estimateAMBFees(uint8[],uint64,bytes,byt.details: returns the gas fees estimation in native tokens if we send message through a combination of AMBs

params.ambIds_: is the identifier of different AMBs
params.dstChainId_: is the identifier of the destination chain

returns.ambFees: is the native_tokens to be sent along the transaction for all the ambIds_ included

estimateAckCost(uint256).details: helps estimate the acknowledgement costs for amb processing

returns.totalFees: is the total fees to be paid in native tokens

estimateAckCostDefault(bool,uint8[],uint.details: helps estimate the acknowledgement costs for amb processing without relying on payloadId (using max values)

params.ackAmbIds: is the list of ambIds to be used for acknowledgement
params.multi: is the flag indicating if the payload is multi or single

returns.totalFees: is the total fees to be paid in native tokens

estimateAckCostDefaultNativeSource(bool,.details: helps estimate the acknowledgement costs for amb processing without relying on payloadId (using max values) with source native amounts

params.ackAmbIds: is the list of ambIds to be used for acknowledgement
params.multi: is the flag indicating if the payload is multi or single

returns.totalFees: is the total fees to be paid in native tokens

estimateMultiDstMultiVault((uint8[][],ui.details: estimates the gas fees for multiple destination and multi vault operation

params.isDeposit_: indicated if the datatype will be used for a deposit
params.req_: is the request object containing all necessary data for the actual operation on SuperRouter

returns.dstAmount: is the gas expense on dst chain in terms of src chain's native tokens
returns.liqAmount: is the amount of liquidity to be provided in native tokens
returns.srcAmount: is the gas expense on source chain in native tokens
returns.totalAmount: is the native_tokens to be sent along the transaction

getRegisterTransmuterAMBData().details: returns the amb overrides & gas to be used

updateRegisterAERC20Params(bytes).details: admin updates config for register transmuter amb params
